MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH3 postcode area of Chester. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:36am on the 28th April 2021.
